[[File:Saul Zaentz.jpg|thumb|250px]]
'''Saul Zaentz''' ([[12 February]], [[1921]]-[[3 January]], [[2014]]) was an American film producer. He was the founder of the ''Saul Zaentz Company''. [[Middle-earth Enterprises]], that owns the worldwide film, stage, and merchandise rights to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and ''[[The Hobbit]]'', until [[2022]], was a division of the Saul Zaentz Company and it was too created by Zaentz. He acquired the film, stage, and merchandise rights of these two books from [[United Artists]] in [[1976]].

He was credited as the producer of [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)]].
